hanzi-su-wiki:
醸

Значения

Варить напитки; вызывать

Мнемоника

Вино 酉 делали совместное 襄 и в расчёте на всех. Брожение.

Варианты

釀, 酿

koohiiStory1: Grass Skirt primitive: Picture some Hawaiian girls, wearing grass skirts and tropical scarfs (or leis), doing a dance. "3, 4, 5, 6 pick up all the celery sticks!".
koohiiStory2: A classic alcohol commercial: whiskey being brewed while girls dance around, scantily clad in their grass skirts.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: An alcohol nurse is someone who nurses alcohol. In other words, they brew it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine a nurse brewing alcohol with the same attention they would nurse a human patient. But this brew is much more important than any person's health.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: A brew of alcohol is what Jourm (じょう) loves most after a long day.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: As you know, Jourm infiltrated your village and pretended to be a large, simple farmhand, only to bring destruction down upon you. After he was done, he sat down and drank a brew with his Viking buddies.

Kanshudo_mnemonic: wear six lots of clothes together (㐮) when you use the sake flask (酉) to brew

醸字的基本解释

醸
niàng
古同“酿”。

醸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niàng］
［《廣韻》女亮切，去漾，娘。］
“酿1”的繁体字。亦作“醸1”。
(1)酿造。原专指酿酒，后亦指利用发酵作用酿造蜜、醋、酱等。
(2)酒。
(3)切割拌和；糅合。
(4)指搀杂，杂凑。
(5)逐渐形成；造成。

醸字的康熙字典解释

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niàng］
["Guangyun" female bright cut, go to Yang, mother. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "飲1". Also known as "醸1".
(1) Brewing. Originally refers exclusively to winemaking, but later also refers to the use of fermentation to brew honey, vinegar, sauce, etc.
(2) Wine.
(3) Cutting and mixing; mixing.
(4) Refers to mixed and mixed.
(5) Gradually formed; caused.
Glutinous rice

Name meaning

niàng
яп. вм. 酿
Radicals: 酉, 㐮  (alcohol, nurse)
Meaning Mnemonic
An alcohol nurse is someone who nurses alcohol. In other words, they brew it.
Imagine a nurse brewing alcohol with the same attention they would nurse a human patient. But this brew is much more important than any person's health.
Reading Mnemonic
A brew of alcohol is what Jourm (じょう) loves most after a long day.
As you know, Jourm infiltrated your village and pretended to be a large, simple farmhand, only to bring destruction down upon you. After he was done, he sat down and drank a brew with his Viking buddies.
